name: Product Owner
description: Responsible for maximizing the value of the product and managing the product backlog.

name: Scrum Master
description: Facilitates Scrum processes and removes impediments for the team.

name: Architect
description: Designs and oversees the technical architecture of the solution.

name: Developer
description: Implements features and fixes bugs as part of the development team.

name: Tester
description: Ensures the quality of the product through testing and validation.

name: Release Train Engineer
description: Servant leader and coach for the Agile Release Train (ART).

name: System Team
description: Provides support in building and maintaining the development environment.

name: Business Owner
description: Key stakeholders responsible for business outcomes.

name: Epic Owner
description: Responsible for coordinating epic implementation across teams.
